mapper.sql: cbe.id, cbe.custom_id, cbe.organization_id, cbe.insert_time, cbe.isdelete, cbe.last_check_time, ci.idcard, ci.vipcard, ci.mobile, ci.username, ci.password, ci.name, ci.sex, ci.birthday, ci.body_height, ci.weight, ci.zhiwen_code, ci.zhiwen_path, lo.name AS organization_name
mapper.select:
select
FROM custom_beloneto_ent cbe LEFT JOIN custom_info ci ON ci.id = cbe.custom_id LEFT JOIN ly_organization lo ON cbe.organization_id = lo.id where cbe.isdelete = 0 AND ci.isvalid = 1
AND cbe.organization_id = ${organization_id}
AND cbe.insert_time >= '${sub_point_id}'
AND cbe.insert_time <= '${insert_time_end}'
AND ci.name = '${name}'
ORDER BY ${orderby}

SELECT pebr.big_item_id, pebr.check_score, pebr.gen_quanzhong, cbi.name, (SELECT cpl.name FROM cf_pingfen_leve cpl WHERE cpl.id = pebr.leve_id) AS leve, cbi.tips_content, cbi.icon, cbi.order_by FROM physical_examination_big_result pebr LEFT JOIN check_big_item cbi ON pebr.big_item_id = cbi.id WHERE pebr.examination_record_id = #{examination_record_id} ORDER BY cbi.order_by ASC
